content: no purls 4 sailors yayalovestoknit august 22 2019 i m tickled to offer no purls 4 sailors in adult sizes medium and large this pattern is based on my no purls 4 me which was written as a child-size pattern the hats for sailors group provides hand-knit and hand-crochet hats for navy and coast guard personnel one ship at a time the group wanted quick and easy patterns to encourage new knitters or knitters who are picking up the craft again after a hiatius at times everyone wants an easy-peasy basic hat project that can be worked on anywhere … something that can be picked up while relaxing with a favorite tv show sitting in a waiting room or riding along on a road trip no purls 4 sailors is knit without any purl stitches because the hat is knit in the round so purling is not necessary to create the stockinette stitch the bottom band is not ribbed so again no purling the snug fit at the bottom band is formed by knitting with a smaller needle size the rolled edge is created as stockinette stitch naturally rolls the decreases to form the crown of the hat are made by knitting 2 stitches together at designated intervals sizes the medium size measures 19 around the bottom edge unstretched and 9 from top to bottom this size will comfortably fit up to a 22 head the large size measures 20 around the bottom edge unstretched and 10 from top to bottom the bottom edge rolls up or down so the wearer can adjust the height of the hat yarn the hats shown in this pattern were all knit using cascade 220 superwash 100% superwash wool 100 grams/220 yards medium size 53 grams/116 yards in cobalt heather large size 65 grams/143 yards of wave in roses 1 | pa ge both sample hats are displayed on the same size mannequin head so you can see the difference in sizing the hat is quite stretchy and forgiving so relax and knit without worry needles us 06 and us 07 circular needles plus us 07 double pointed needles other tools stitch marker tapestry or darning needle gauge 19 sts x 24 rnds = 4 square abbreviations k= knit k2tog = knit two stitches together rem = remain round s = round s st s = stitch es yd s = yard s begin pattern the number of cast-on stitches for the medium size is listed first then the large size is provided in parentheses measurements are also provided in this same manner using the us 06 circular needle cast on 88 96 sts taking care to not twist the stitches join to begin knitting in the round place marker to indicate the beginning of round knit every round until the hat measures 2¾ 3½ from cast-on edge unroll the edge to take this measurement if
